attributes.action: Grant asylum to Asia Bibi and her family.
attributes.additional_details:
Asia Bibi: anti-blasphemy protests spread across Pakistan
Anti-blasphemy campaigners bring country to standstill in protest over acquittal of Bibi

https://www.theguardian.com/world/2018/nov/01/asia-bibi-anti-blasphemy-protests-spread-across-pakistan
attributes.background: Asia Bibi has been cleared of blasphemy, but her acquittal has angered many, meaning that her life is potentially in danger. She has a well founded fear of persecution, and we should offer her asylum here.
